The term nutrition refers to the process by which organisms, including humans, obtain and utilize energy and nutrients from food to sustain life. Nutrition involves the digestion, absorption, and utilization of macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, and fats) and micronutrients (vitamins and minerals) necessary for growth, maintenance, and repair of bodily functions.
